message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product, and I think you'd find it valuable. I'm willing to part with it for $150. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $130 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, I'm willing to come down to $140. I believe this product will bring you a lot of value.
I appreciate you coming down to $140, but I was thinking more along the lines of $135. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
